snippet: China’s premier, Li Keqiang, condemned the deaths of four Chinese farmers he said were killed by a bomb from a Myanmar warplane.
lead_paragraph: China’s premier, Li Keqiang, condemned the deaths of four Chinese farmers he said were killed by a bomb from a Myanmar warplane.

headline.main: Myanmar Is Issued Warning by Chinese Premier Over Bombing Deaths
headline.print_headline: Myanmar Is Issued Warning by Chinese Premier Over Bombing Deaths
